subject: Hi dear ,
body:
Hi dear ,
I am Mr. Philippe Yann, I work with the Bank of Africa in Abidjan Cote d'Ivoire. I am contacting you in regards to a fund transfer.
I will appreciate your willingness to handle this with maturity. I will give you all the details you need to know regarding this transaction. It is 100% legal and risk free. I am interested to invest in these areas (Real Estate Management / Construction, Land and Multifamily Housing, Hospital / Laboratories Equipment's, Agricultural Equipment's and other lucrative business which you can advice on as you will assist me to handle it. I will give you all the details you need to know regarding this transaction.
 It is 100% legal and risk free
.
Please reply with your direct phone number.
Thanks and God bless you.
Mr. Philippe.

subject: Re: Hi dear ,
body:
Dear Mr. Philippe,

Thank you for your email and the opportunity to assist you with your investment plans. I am indeed interested in helping you invest in Real Estate Management, Land and Housing, Hospital and other lucrative businesses.

However, before we proceed further, I would like to know more about the fund transfer that you mentioned. Could you please provide me with more details about it? 

You can reach me at this number: +44 20 7946 0000

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Bridget
